title: DDT in Kale
description:
Description
A numeric vector of 15 measurements by different laboratories of the
pesticide DDT in kale, in ppm (parts per million) using the multiple
pesticide residue measurement.
format:
C. E. Finsterwalder (1976)
Collaborative study of an extension of the Mills et al
method for the determination of pesticide residues in food.
J. Off. Anal. Chem. 59, 169–171
